lemma BIS_SI_simps [simp]: "LengthF (convschema (a::BIS itself)) = 0.9143993" 
                           "MassF (convschema a) = 0.453592338"
                           "TimeF (convschema a) = 1" 
                           "CurrentF (convschema a) = 1" 
                           "TemperatureF (convschema a) = 5/9"
translations:
lemma BIS_SI_simps [simp]: "LengthF (convschema (a::BIS itself)) = 0.9143993" 
                           "MassF (convschema a) = 0.453592338"
                           "TimeF (convschema a) = 1" 
                           "CurrentF (convschema a) = 1" 
                           "TemperatureF (convschema a) = 5/9"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (LengthF (schema\<^sub>C a) = 9143993 / 10 ^ 7 &&&
     MassF (schema\<^sub>C a) = 453592338 / 10 ^ 9) &&&
    TimeF (schema\<^sub>C a) = 1 &&&
    CurrentF (schema\<^sub>C a) = 1 &&&
    TemperatureF (schema\<^sub>C a) = 5 / 9

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. metrify foot = 9143993 / 10 ^ 7 / 3 *\<^sub>Q metre

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. metrify (70 *\<^sub>Q mile \<^bold>\<cdot> hour\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one>) =
    704087461 / 22500000 *\<^sub>Q
    metre \<^bold>\<cdot> second\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. QMC(CGS \<rightarrow> BIS) (1 *\<^sub>Q centimetre) =
    100000 / 9143993 *\<^sub>Q yard
